intro: Coelarthron, commonly known as the ghost flower, is a unique plant belonging to the family Melanthiaceae. It is characterized by its striking, pale purple or white flowers that resemble ghostly apparitions, hence its common name. Its botanical features include narrow, lance-shaped leaves and a compact, herbaceous growth habit.
